      BootTypes.UpdateSpec.Builder setDelay(java.lang.Long delay)

      Flag indicating whether to use EFI legacy boot mode.
      BootTypes.UpdateSpec.Builder setEnterSetupMode(java.lang.Boolean enterSetupMode)

      Protocol to use when attempting to boot the virtual machine over the network.

      BootTypes.UpdateSpec.Builder setRetryDelay(java.lang.Long retryDelay)

    • Method Detail

      • setType

        public BootTypes.UpdateSpec.Builder setType(BootTypes.Type type)
        Firmware type to be used by the virtual machine. If null, the value is unchanged.
        Parameters:
        type - New value for the property.

      • setEfiLegacyBoot

        public BootTypes.UpdateSpec.Builder setEfiLegacyBoot(java.lang.Boolean efiLegacyBoot)
        Flag indicating whether to use EFI legacy boot mode. If null, the value is unchanged.
        Parameters:
        efiLegacyBoot - New value for the property.

      • setNetworkProtocol

        public BootTypes.UpdateSpec.Builder setNetworkProtocol(BootTypes.NetworkProtocol networkProtocol)
        Protocol to use when attempting to boot the virtual machine over the network. If null, the value is unchanged.
        Parameters:
        networkProtocol - New value for the property.

      • setDelay

        public BootTypes.UpdateSpec.Builder setDelay(java.lang.Long delay)
        Delay in milliseconds before beginning the firmware boot process when the virtual machine is powered on. This delay may be used to provide a time window for users to connect to the virtual machine console and enter BIOS setup mode. If null, the value is unchanged.
        Parameters:
        delay - New value for the property.

      • setRetry

        public BootTypes.UpdateSpec.Builder setRetry(java.lang.Boolean retry)
        Flag indicating whether the virtual machine should automatically retry the boot process after a failure. If null, the value is unchanged.
        Parameters:
        retry - New value for the property.

      • setRetryDelay

        public BootTypes.UpdateSpec.Builder setRetryDelay(java.lang.Long retryDelay)
        Delay in milliseconds before retrying the boot process after a failure; applicable only when BootTypes.Info.getRetry() is true. If null, the value is unchanged.
        Parameters:
        retryDelay - New value for the property.

      • setEnterSetupMode

        public BootTypes.UpdateSpec.Builder setEnterSetupMode(java.lang.Boolean enterSetupMode)
        Flag indicating whether the firmware boot process should automatically enter setup mode the next time the virtual machine boots. Note that this flag will automatically be reset to false once the virtual machine enters setup mode. If null, the value is unchanged.
        Parameters:
        enterSetupMode - New value for the property.

      • build

        public BootTypes.UpdateSpec build()
